languages.text:
К общим негативным эффектам относятся:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Горение{/g} — цель каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} получает {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненный урон{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Кровотечение{/g} — цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} в начале каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Отравление{/g} — в начале каждого своего хода цель должна пройти проверку Выносливости на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}, чтобы попытаться снять этот эффект. При провале цель получает урон.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Утомление{/g} — каждый уровень эффекта дает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 при любых проверках {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силы{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g}, а также −1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очко передвижения{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Тревожность{/g} — каждый уровень эффекта дает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 при прохождении любых проверок {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Замешательство{/g} — каждый уровень эффекта дает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 при любых проверках {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнего Боя{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекта{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятия{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Ослепление{/g} — цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −30 при любых проверках {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнего Боя{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g}, а также −30% к шансу {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирования{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Ошеломление{/g} — цель получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −20 при прохождении любых проверок {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнего Боя{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силы{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Замедление{/g} — количество {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очков передвижения{/g} уменьшается на 3.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}Пси-подавление{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} снижается на 1.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Оглушение{/g} — в состоянии оглушения персонаж не может {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняться{/g} и совершать {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Обездвиживание{/g} — обездвиженные цели не восстанавливают очки передвижения в начале своего хода и не могут применять {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g}, позволяющие перемещаться или добавляющие очки передвижения.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}Неспособность атаковать{/g} — цель не может использовать оружие.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PsychosomaticTraumaEffect}Психосоматическая травма{/g} — цель не может использовать {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Опрокидывание{/g} — цель не может совершать действия и получает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −30% к {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g}.</indent>
Все остальные негативные эффекты считаются уникальными — они встречаются сильно реже и, как правило, их могут накладывать особые противники или способности.

Common negative effects include:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}: suffers {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Bleeding{/g}: suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g}: at the start of every turn, the affected target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} or suffer damage.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigued{/g}: each stack grants a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, Toughness, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and −1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement point{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Disturbed{/g}: each stack grants a −10 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexed{/g}: each stack grants a −10 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Blinded{/g}: suffers a −30 penalty to Ballistic Skill and Weapon Skill, as well as a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Staggered{/g}: suffers a −20 penalty to Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, Strength, Toughness, and Agility.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Slowed{/g}: movement points are reduced by −3.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}Psy dampening{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is reduced by −1.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Stunned{/g}: while stunned, a character cannot parry, dodge, or make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilised{/g}: immobilised targets do not regain movement points at the beginning of their turn and cannot use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that move them or add movement points.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}Cannot attack{/g}: cannot use weapons.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PsychosomaticTraumaEffect}Psychosomatic trauma{/g} cannot use {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Prone{/g}: cannot act and suffers a −30 penalty to parry and dodge.</indent>
All other negative effects are considered unique — they are not nearly as commonly encountered. These unique effects are generally applied by specific abilities of characters or enemies.

-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Bleeding{/g}: suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g}: at the start of every turn, the affected target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} or suffer damage.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigued{/g}: each stack grants a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, Toughness, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and −1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement point{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Disturbed{/g}: each stack grants a −10 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexed{/g}: each stack grants a −10 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Blinded{/g}: suffers a −30 penalty to Ballistic Skill and Weapon Skill, as well as a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Staggered{/g}: suffers a −20 penalty to Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, Strength, Toughness, and Agility.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Slowed{/g}: movement points are reduced by −3.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}Psy dampening{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is reduced by −1.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Stunned{/g}: while stunned, a character cannot parry, dodge, or make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilised{/g}: immobilised targets do not regain movement points at the beginning of their turn and cannot use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that move them or add movement points.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}Cannot attack{/g}: cannot use weapons.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PsychosomaticTraumaEffect}Psychosomatic trauma{/g} cannot use {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Prone{/g}: cannot act and suffers a −30 penalty to parry and dodge.</indent>
All other negative effects are considered unique — they are not nearly as commonly encountered. These unique effects are generally applied by specific abilities of characters or enemies.

languages.text:
一般的なマイナス効果には以下のようなものがある：
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃焼{/g}：毎{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}にて{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}燃焼ダメージ{/g}を受ける。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}：各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける。</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}：毎ターン開始時、{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を受けたターゲットはこの効果を除去するために{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に合格するか、ダメージを受けなければならない。</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}：スタック1つにつき、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}、耐久力、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}に-10の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}に−1のペナルティ を受ける。</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}動揺{/g}：スタック1つにつき、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}に-10のペナルティを受ける。</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}：スタック1つにつき、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}知覚{/g}に−10のペナルティを受ける。</indent>　
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}：射撃技能と近接攻撃に−30のペナルティを受け、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}に−30%のペナルティを受ける。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろめき{/g}：近接攻撃、射撃技能、強度、耐久力、敏捷性に−20のペナルティを受ける。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}速度低下{/g}：移動ポイントが−3減少する。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}精神減衰{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レーティング{/g}が-1減少する。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶{/g}：気絶している間は、受け流し、回避、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を行うことができない。</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}不動化{/g}：不動化されたターゲットはターンの開始時に移動ポイントを 回復できず、移動や移動ポイントを増やす{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用できない。</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}攻撃できない{/g}：武器を使うことができない。</indent>
- <indent=5%>心身症の{g|Encyclopedia:PsychosomaticTraumaEffect}外傷{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}が使えない。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}うつ伏せ{/g}：行動できず、−30のペナルティを受ける。</indent>
それ以外のマイナス効果はユニークなものであり、一般的にはあまり出会わないものである。これらのユニークな効果は、一般的にキャラクターや敵の特定のアビリティによって適用される。

- <indent=5%>よろけ：武器スキル、弾道スキル、腕力、耐久力、敏捷性に−20のペナルティを受ける。</indent>
- <indent=5%>速度低下：移動ポイントが−3減少する。</indent>
- <indent=5%>精神減衰：超能力レートが−1される。</indent>
- <indent=5%>気絶：気絶している間は、受け流し、回避、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}を行うことができない。</indent>

languages.text:
常规负面效果包括：
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}：每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}受到{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}：每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}：每个回合开始时，受影响的目标必须通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}才能移除此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}，否则会受到伤害。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}：每层效果都会使{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、坚韧与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}降低10点，{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}降低1点。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}惊扰{/g}：每层效果会使{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}降低10点。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}：每层效果会使{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}降低10点。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}：弹道技能与武器技能降低30点，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}降低30%。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}：武器技能、弹道技能、力量、韧性、敏捷降低20点。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}：移动点数降低3点。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}灵能抑制{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}降低1级。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}：处于眩晕状态的角色无法招架、闪避，也无法发动{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}：被定身的目标在回合开始时无法恢复移动点数，也无法使用位移或增加移动点数的相关{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}无法攻击{/g}：无法使用武器。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PsychosomaticTraumaEffect}精神创伤{/g}：无法使用{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}：无法采取任何行动，且招架与闪避降低30%。</indent>
所有其他负面效果都是独特效果，这些效果并不属于常规负面效果。独特负面效果通常由特定角色或敌人的特定能力施加。

- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PsychosomaticTraumaEffect}精神创伤{/g}：无法使用{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}：无法采取任何行动，且招架与闪避降低30%。</indent>
所有其他负面效果都是独特效果，这些效果并不属于常规负面效果。独特负面效果通常由特定角色或敌人的特定能力施加。

languages.text:
Los efectos negativos comunes incluyen:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Quemadura{/g}: sufre {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g} cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Hemorragia{/g}: sufre {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} al principio de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxina{/g}: al principio de cada turno, el objetivo afectado debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} para eliminar el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g} o sufrir daño.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigado{/g}: cada acumulación inflige una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −10 a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}, la Resistencia y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} y −1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}punto de movimiento{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Perturbado{/g}: cada acumulación inflige una penalización de −10 a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplejo{/g}: cada acumulación inflige una penalización de −10 a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Cegado{/g}: inflige una penalización de −30 a la Habilidad de proyectiles y la Habilidad de armas, además de una penalización del −30 % a la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Desequilibrado{/g}: inflige una penalización de −20 a la Habilidad de armas, la Habilidad de proyectiles, la Fuerza, la Resistencia y la Agilidad.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentizado{/g}: los puntos de movimiento de reducen en −3.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}Amortiguación psíquica{/g}: el {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} se reduce en −1.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Aturdido{/g}: Mientras está aturdido, el personaje no puede parar, esquivar ni lanzar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Inmovilizado{/g}: los objetivos inmovilizados no recuperan puntos de movimiento al comienzo de sus turnos y tampoco pueden usar {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} que los muevan o les otorguen puntos de movimiento.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}No puede atacar{/g}: no puede usar armas.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PsychosomaticTraumaEffect}Traumatismo psicosomático{/g}: no puede usar {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Derribado{/g}: no puede actuar y sufre una penalización de −30 a la parada y la esquiva.</indent>
Los demás efectos negativos se consideran únicos, al estar mucho menos extendidos. Estos efectos únicos los suelen aplicar capacidades concretas de personajes o enemigos.
languages.original_text:
Common negative effects include:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}: suffers {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Bleeding{/g}: suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g}: at the start of every turn, the affected target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} or suffer damage.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigued{/g}: each stack grants a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, Toughness, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and −1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement point{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Disturbed{/g}: each stack grants a −10 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexed{/g}: each stack grants a −10 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Blinded{/g}: suffers a −30 penalty to Ballistic Skill and Weapon Skill, as well as a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Staggered{/g}: suffers a −20 penalty to Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, Strength, Toughness, and Agility.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Slowed{/g}: movement points are reduced by −3.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}Psy dampening{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is reduced by −1.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Stunned{/g}: while stunned, a character cannot parry, dodge, or make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilised{/g}: immobilised targets do not regain movement points at the beginning of their turn and cannot use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that move them or add movement points.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}Cannot attack{/g}: cannot use weapons.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PsychosomaticTraumaEffect}Psychosomatic trauma{/g} cannot use {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Prone{/g}: cannot act and suffers a −30 penalty to parry and dodge.</indent>
All other negative effects are considered unique — they are not nearly as commonly encountered. These unique effects are generally applied by specific abilities of characters or enemies.

languages.text:
Gewöhnliche negative Effekte sind unter anderem:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}: Erleidet jede {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}: Erleidet zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}: Zu Beginn jedes Zugs muss das betroffene Ziel eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeits{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen, um diesen {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekt{/g} zu entfernen, sonst erleidet es Schaden.</indent>
-<indent=5%> {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Erschöpft{/g}: Jeder Stapel verursacht einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −10 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}, Zähigkeit und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} sowie −1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkt{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Verstört{/g}: Jeder Stapel verursacht einen Abzug von −10 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g}: Jeder Stapel verursacht einen Abzug von −10 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Geblendet{/g}: Erleidet einen Abzug von −30 auf Ballistik-Fähigkeit und Waffenfähigkeit sowie einen Abzug von −30 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumelnd{/g}: Erleidet einen Abzug von −20 auf Waffenfähigkeit, Ballistik-Fähigkeit, Stärke, Zähigkeit und Beweglichkeit.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Verlangsamt{/g}: Bewegungspunkte werden um −3 reduziert.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}Psidämpfer{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} wird um −1 reduziert.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Betäubt{/g}: Ein betäubter Charakter kann nicht parieren, ausweichen oder {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Überraschungsangriffe{/g} ausführen.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Gelähmt{/g}: Gelähmte Ziele regenerieren zu Beginn ihres Zugs keine Bewegungspunkte und können keine {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} nutzen, die sie fortbewegen oder Bewegungspunkte gewähren.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}Angriff unmöglich{/g}: Kann keine Waffen verwenden.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PsychosomaticTraumaEffect}Psychosomatisches Trauma{/g}: Kann keine {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kräfte{/g} einsetzen.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Hingestreckt{/g}: Kann nicht agieren und erleidet einen Abzug von −30 auf Parieren und Ausweichen.</indent>
Alle anderen negativen Effekte werden als einzigartig eingestuft — sie treten nicht annähernd so häufig auf. Diese einzigartigen Effekte werden in der Regel durch spezielle Fähigkeiten von Charakteren oder Feinden verursacht.

languages.text:
Les effets négatifs les plus courants sont les suivants :
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} : inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} à chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} : inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} : au début de chaque tour, la cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} pour se débarrasser de cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g}, faute de quoi des dégâts lui sont infligés.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigue{/g} : chaque cumul de cet effet inflige une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, d'Endurance et d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de −10 et −1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}point de déplacement{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Perturbation{/g} : chaque cumul de cet effet inflige une pénalité de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} de −10.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g} : chaque cumul de cet effet inflige une pénalité de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de −10.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g} : inflige une pénalité à la Capacité de tir et à la Capacité de combat de −30, ainsi qu'une pénalité à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} de −30 %.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} : inflige une pénalité à la Capacité de combat, à la Capacité de tir, à la Force, à l'Endurance et à l'Agilité de −20.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} : réduit les points de déplacement de −3.</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}Affaiblissement psy{/g} : réduit l'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} de −1.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} : un personnage étourdi ne peut ni parer, ni esquiver, ni lancer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g} : les cibles immobilisées ne reçoivent pas de points de déplacement au début de leur tour et ne peuvent pas utiliser de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} permettant d'effectuer un déplacement ou d'obtenir des points de déplacement.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}Attaque impossible{/g} : empêche d'utiliser des armes.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PsychosomaticTraumaEffect}Traumatisme psychosomatique{/g}: empêche d'utiliser des {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} : empêche d'agir et inflige une pénalité à la parade et à l'esquive de −30.</indent>
Tous les autres effets négatifs sont considérés comme uniques, ce qui signifie qu'ils sont nettement moins fréquents. Ces effets uniques sont généralement appliqués par des capacités propres à certains personnages ou ennemis.
languages.original_text:
Common negative effects include:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}: suffers {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Bleeding{/g}: suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g}: at the start of every turn, the affected target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to remove this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} or suffer damage.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigued{/g}: each stack grants a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, Toughness, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and −1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement point{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Disturbed{/g}: each stack grants a −10 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexed{/g}: each stack grants a −10 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Blinded{/g}: suffers a −30 penalty to Ballistic Skill and Weapon Skill, as well as a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Staggered{/g}: suffers a −20 penalty to Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, Strength, Toughness, and Agility.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Slowed{/g}: movement points are reduced by −3.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}Psy dampening{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is reduced by −1.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Stunned{/g}: while stunned, a character cannot parry, dodge, or make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilised{/g}: immobilised targets do not regain movement points at the beginning of their turn and cannot use {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} that move them or add movement points.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}Cannot attack{/g}: cannot use weapons.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PsychosomaticTraumaEffect}Psychosomatic trauma{/g} cannot use {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Prone{/g}: cannot act and suffers a −30 penalty to parry and dodge.</indent>
All other negative effects are considered unique — they are not nearly as commonly encountered. These unique effects are generally applied by specific abilities of characters or enemies.

traits.locale_text:
Les effets négatifs les plus courants sont les suivants :
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} : inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} à chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} : inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} : au début de chaque tour, la cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} pour se débarrasser de cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g}, faute de quoi des dégâts lui sont infligés.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigue{/g} : chaque cumul de cet effet inflige une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, d'Endurance et d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de −10 et −1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}point de déplacement{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Perturbation{/g} : chaque cumul de cet effet inflige une pénalité de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} de −10.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g} : chaque cumul de cet effet inflige une pénalité de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de −10.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g} : inflige une pénalité à la Capacité de tir et à la Capacité de combat de −30, ainsi qu'une pénalité à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} de −30 %.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} : inflige une pénalité à la Capacité de combat, à la Capacité de tir, à la Force, à l'Endurance et à l'Agilité de −20.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} : réduit les points de déplacement de −3.</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}Affaiblissement psy{/g} : réduit l'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} de −1.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} : un personnage étourdi ne peut ni parer, ni esquiver, ni lancer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g} : les cibles immobilisées ne reçoivent pas de points de déplacement au début de leur tour et ne peuvent pas utiliser de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} permettant d'effectuer un déplacement ou d'obtenir des points de déplacement.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}Attaque impossible{/g} : empêche d'utiliser des armes.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PsychosomaticTraumaEffect}Traumatisme psychosomatique{/g}: empêche d'utiliser des {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} : empêche d'agir et inflige une pénalité à la parade et à l'esquive de −30.</indent>
Tous les autres effets négatifs sont considérés comme uniques, ce qui signifie qu'ils sont nettement moins fréquents. Ces effets uniques sont généralement appliqués par des capacités propres à certains personnages ou ennemis.

languages.text:
Yaygın olumsuz etkiler şunlardır:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Yanma{/g}: Hedef her {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}ateş hasarına{/g} maruz kalır.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Kanama{/g}: Hedef her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turun{/g} başında {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} maruz kalır.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toksin{/g}: Etkilenen hedef, bu {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}etkiden{/g} kurtulmak için her turun başında bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmek zorundadır. Aksi takdirde hasara maruz kalır.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Yorgunluk{/g}: Her üst üste birikim; {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g}, Dayanıklılık ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} niteliklerine −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} verirken {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}hareket puanını{/g} da 1 azaltır.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Kaygı{/g}: Her üst üste birikim, tüm {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} testlerine −10 ceza puanı verir.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Şaşkınlık{/g}: Her üst üste birikim; {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} testlerine −10 ceza puanı verir.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Körleşme{/g}: Hedef, Balistik Yetenek ile Silah Yeteneği niteliklerine −30 ceza puanı; {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} değerlerine ise −%30 ceza puanı alır.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Afallama{/g}: Hedef; Silah Yeteneği, Balistik Yetenek, Kuvvet, Dayanıklılık ve Çeviklik niteliklerine −20 ceza puanı alır.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Yavaşlama{/g}: Hareket puanları 3 azalır.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}Ruhsezi Körelmesi{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Ruhsezi derecesi{/g} 1 puan azalır.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Sersemlik{/g}: Sersemlemiş bir karakter; savuşturma, kaçınma veya {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırısı{/g} yapamaz.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Felç{/g}: Felç olan bir hedefin hareket puanları, tur tekrar kendisine geldiğinde yenilenmez. Ayrıca hedef, kendisini hareket ettiren veya hareket puanı ekleyen {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetler{/g} kullanamaz.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}Saldıramama{/g}: Hedef silah kullanamaz.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:PsychosomaticTraumaEffect}Ruhsezi Travması{/g}: Hedef, {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi gücü{/g} kullanamaz.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Yere Devrilme{/g}: Hedef, eyleme geçemez ve savuşturma ve kaçınma değerlerine −30 ceza puanı alır.</indent>
Diğer tüm olumsuz etkiler eşsiz olarak kabul edilirler. Yukarıdakiler kadar yaygın rastlanılmazlar. Bu eşsiz etkiler, genellikle karakter veya düşmanların belirli birtakım kabiliyetlerince uygulanırlar.
